title: Social Surge - CNNMoney
text:
Log In Log Out Social Surge 
With our proprietary social metric, SURGE (Social Unit of Reach, Growth & Engagement), CNNMoney is calculating and measuring the viral impact and engagement of stories in real time. 
When stories reach a certain viral threshold based on its reach and user engagement, they will show a special SURGE icon - an indication of the most passionate conversations happening on the biggest social network - Facebook. 
So click away, share and join in the dialogue. Trending Google+ 
Most stock quote data provided by BATS. Market indices are shown in real time, except for the DJIA, which is delayed by two minutes. All times are ET. Disclaimer .
